app.name: projutils
app.summary: This is a collection of scripts and utility application that are grouped by relevance to manipulation of projects.

proc.name: convert_ngc
proc.summary: Convert all provided NGC files to a supported format

proc.name: copy_run
proc.summary: Copy a run from an already existing run, source-run, to a new copy of that run, destination-run.

proc.name: export_bd_synth
proc.summary: Create and write a single design checkpoint and stub files for a Block Design (BD), for use with third party synthesis tools. Perform synthesis as necessary.

proc.name: generate_hier_access
proc.summary: Generate sources for hierarchical access simulation

proc.name: write_project_tcl
proc.summary: Export Tcl script for re-creating the current project
